name: William George
description: William George has a PhD in mathematics from the University of Toronto. His thesis was on number theory problems related to elliptic curve cryptography. William began actively researching problems related to blockchains during postdoctoral fellowships at the University of Toronto and at Ã‰cole Polytechnique (Palaiseau, France). William has been doing crypto-economics research for the blockchain-based dispute resolution platform Kleros since 2018.
